name: BlockStream
description:
3D retro-inspired game. See how many rows you can clear while the never ending stream of blocks pile up!

Endless is an untimed version, games only end when you pile too high (20 blocks). The zip folder just titled "Block_Stream.zip" is my official jam submission". Endless is just if you want to play a round for more than five minutes.

Leave a comment with your high score!
